xwikidoc.content:
### Missing: admin.wikis=Wikis admin.wikis.descriptor=描述符号 admin.wikis.descriptor.description=配置Wiki描述符号 admin.wiki.description=描述您的Wiki（好听的名称和描述）并设置其所有者和主页。 ### Missing: platform.wiki.admin.wiki.ownerProblemConfirmation=The new owner's user does not exist or it may come from a different wiki.\\nAre you sure you want to use it and continue with the save operation? ### Missing: platform.wiki.admin.wiki.csrfInvalidError=Invalid security (CSRF) token. Please refresh the page and try again. ### Missing: platform.wiki.admin.wiki.requiredFieldsError=The 'Homepage' field cannot be empty. ### Missing: platform.wiki.admin.wiki.ownerWarning=Warning: Once you change this, the previous owner will lose their owner rights. If that is you, make sure you do not lock yourself out of the wiki. If that happens by mistake, you will need to contact the main wiki's administrators or use the superadmin account.
############################################################################### ## Deprecated ## Note: each element should be removed when the last branch using it is no longer supported ###############################################################################
